actions.text: Amendment SA 3886 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3886 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Corker. (consideration: CR S2577-2578; text: CR S2577-2578) To remove language relating to Iran hostages compensation, to provide that the Ambassador at Large for International Religious Freedom shall have primary responsibility for religious freedom training, and to make other technical amendments.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3886 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3886 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Corker.

purpose: To remove language relating to Iran hostages compensation, to provide that the Ambassador at Large for International Religious Freedom shall have primary responsibility for religious freedom training, and to make other technical amendments.
